titleStmt.title: A new spring shadovved in sundry pithie poems. Musophilus
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for Thomas Baylie, and are to be sold at his shop, in the middle-row in Holborne, neere Staple-Inne,
